content: vintage elizabeth by denise e m bartels 1 copyright ©2024 denise e m bartels y arn lace weight i used a handspun yarn spun from a blend of merino 75% and bombyx silk 25% y ardage approximately 1 000 yards 108 grams n eedles i used us 1 5 2 5 mm but i knit very loosely d epth at center 34 inches l ength 71 inches t he shawl is triangular and is knit from the top down with increases on every right-side row worked at the edges and on each side of the center stitch the design combines a variation on the shetland twins pattern and the basic shetland tree pattern the depth of the edging can be changed by repeating row 253 266 of chart 5 the only difference between the row is the ends to deal with the shaping increases so you can stop whenever you want or when you run out of yarn i would have made mine deeper but i ran out of yarn 2 copyright ©2024 denise e m bartels s tart with a tab cast-on i like a seed stitch edging instead of a garter stitch one because the gauge is closer to the stockinette gauge and i like the texture cast on 5 stitches and do 6 row of k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 on the seventh row k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 turn work 90 degrees and pick up 3 stitches along the side of the little tab you just made turn another 90 degrees and pick up 5 stitches along the cast-on edge you can also start with a provisional cast-on to give you the final 5 stitches a ll wrong-side even row are k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 purl to last 5 stitches k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 r ows 1 70 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 chart 1 k1 chart 1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 r ows 71 - 124 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 chart 2 k1 chart 2 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 r ows 125 - 180 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 chart 3 k1 chart 3 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 r ows 181 226 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 chart 4 k1 chart 4 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 r ows 227 265 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 chart 5 k1 chart 5 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 note the depth of the edging can be changed by repeating row 253 266 of chart 5 b ind off loosely and block i bound off on the purl side using the bind off p1 *p1 slip stitches back to left needle and p2tog repeat from * 3 copyright ©2024 denise e m bartels 4 copyright ©2024 denise e m bartels 5 copyright ©2024 denise e m bartels 6 copyright ©2024 denise e m bartels 7 copyright ©2024 denise e m bartels 8 copyright ©2024 denise e m bartels
